name: Turkey Chili
ingredients: 3 Cups yellow onions (sautee in olive oil)
1 LB lean ground turkey or ground beef
1 tbsp. fresh oregano or 1 tsp dried 1 rinsed can of pinto beans
1 tsp. ground cumin 1 rinsed can of black beans
1 tsp. ground mustard 3 cups or 1 28 oz. can of undrained roasted chopped tomotes
1 tsp. minced garlic 1 can of fat free chicken broth
